thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great place to stay
thread.title_full: Great place to stay - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Chuck G
title: Great place to stay
text: Great location to markets and restaurants. Rooms were very spacious, cozy and comfortable. Very nice hotel bar. Breakfast buffet was spectacular! Transportation options readily available. Staff was very friendly and accomodating. Would recommend for any type of travel. Very quiet and relaxing, great pool area with a huge fitness & weight center. Classy establishment.
